metadata.title: Speedo Boys' Trunk Style
features: Full elastic waist with mesh liner for easy fit comfort
Block the burn upf 50+ protective fabric to safeguard against sun's harmful rays
Quick drying exclusive speedry water repellant fabric
Made by speedo, the world's no1 swim brand
description: Speedo equals better fit, performance, quality, and innovation, the boy's 8-20 marina easy stripe swim trunk is a great cargo style in a fashion forward stripe print with full elastic waist and mesh liner for improved comfort and fit, it offers trademarked speedry water repellant fabric that limits water absorption so dries twice as fast, it also features our exclusive uv block the burn technology to protect from the sun's harmful rays by offering more body coverage, tighter knit fabric for higher level of protection, and improved fit so that over stretched product does not decrease the upf rating, this is the perfect suit for playing in the pool, taking swim lessons, or while active at the beach, look and feel your best in or out of the water, while you play, train or win in speedo, the choice of champions
metadata.details: {"Item model number": "7475096-405", "Department": "Boys", "Date First Available": "July 28, 2020", "Manufacturer": "Speedo Children's Apparel"}
